attributes.action: MAKE ALL CLUBS OFFER FREE DRINK COVERS
attributes.additional_details:
The Pubic & I want to be able to go out to a venue or nightclub and enjoy the night with the safety of knowing nothing can enter our drink and being able to get a Anti-spiking cover from
the nightclub or Venue free of charge.
attributes.background: The public & I would like the Government to bring into place a guideline that ALL nightclubs and venues that sell Alcoholic Beverages to offer FREE Anti-spiking covers.

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/596308
